name: Legacy of Dreams
flavorText: A Xiansai master forged this gem from other powerful rings hoping to combine their potencies and form a synergy.
flavorTextHtml: A Xiansai master forged this gem from other powerful rings hoping to combine their potencies and form a synergy.

secondary.textHtml: While you have no set bonuses equipped every legendary item you have equipped increases your damage dealt by 3.75% and reduces your damage taken by 2%. 3.75%
